summary: New York City, the most populous city in the US, is a global center for finance, culture, and diplomacy. With over 8 million people, it's the most densely populated major city in the country and a gateway for immigration. Founded in the 1620s by Dutch colonists, it became an English settlement in 1664 and was permanently named New York in 1674. Wall Street in Manhattan makes New York a leading financial center, and it's also known for its diverse languages and large immigrant population. The city is made up of five boroughs and has the most billionaires and millionaires of any city worldwide.
title: New York City
